metadata.title: CVE-2022-25314 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.5, there is an integer overflow incopyString.

criterions.comment: cmake: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ghostscript: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
